name: deliberately
trans: in a way that is intended or planned

name: chunk
trans: a large piece or part

name: obesity
trans: the fact of being extremely fat, in a way that is dangerous for health

name: physical
trans: connected with the body

name: crucial
trans: (of a decision or event) extremely important because many other things depend on it

name: intellectual
trans: relating to the ability to think and understand ideas at a high level, or involving ideas

name: overwhelming
trans: very great or strong

name: suffer
trans: to experience or show the effects of something bad

name: merely
trans: only; and nothing more

name: emotion
trans: (a) strong feeling, such as of love, anger, fear, etc.

name: rejuvenate
trans: to make someone look or feel young and energetic again

name: passive
trans: not reacting to what happens, or not acting or taking part

name: pastime
trans: an activity that is done for enjoyment

name: reluctant
trans: not wanting to do something and therefore slow to do it

name: depression
trans: a feeling of sadness, or medical a type of mental illness that causes long periods of unhappiness

name: authority
trans: the power to control or demand obedience from others

name: acknowledge
trans: to accept the truth or recognize the existence of something

name: obvious
trans: easily seen, recognized, or understood

name: industrious
trans: regularly working very hard

name: engage
trans: to cause someone to become interested or involved in an activity, or to attract someone’s interest
